channel.title: Basic on NTU IoT Research Group
channel.description: Recent content in Basic on NTU IoT Research Group

item.title: Wenjie PhD defense 2023
item.description: Wenjie completed his PhD defense. Wenjie completed his PhD defense on June 27th 2023.

item.title: e-Energy 2023
item.description: ACM e-Energy'23 Successfully Concluded ACM e-Energy'23 held at Orlando has been successfully concluded, where Prof. Rui Tan served as a TPC Co-Chair. Link to album

item.title: CPS-IoT 2023
item.description: Jiale, Wenjie, Yimin presented at CPS-IoT Week 2023 Group members Jiale Chen, Wenjie Luo, and Yimin Dai presented their works at CPS-IoT Week 2023.

item.title: ICCPS 2023 Best Paper
item.description: Jiale Chen’s work won best paper award at ICCPS 2023 Jiale’s work, “BubCam”, won best paper award at The 14th ACM/IEEE International Conference on Cyber-Physical System. Congratulations!

item.title: SenSys 2022
item.description: Group members/alumni presented papers on SenSys'22 Linshan and alumni Qun and Zhenyu presented their works on SenSys'22, Boston. PriMask is selected as SenSys'22 Best Paper Candidate Linshan’s work PriMask is selected as SenSys'22 Best Paper Candidate. Congratulations!

item.title: TU Delft Faculty
item.description: Qun will join TU Delft as a tenure-track Assistant Professor. Qun will join TU Delft as a tenure-track Assistant Professor, Aug 30th, 2022..

item.title: Linshan PhD defense 2021
item.description: Linshan completed his PhD defense. Linshan completed his PhD defense, Dec 6th 2021.

item.title: Zhenyu Award 2021
item.description: Group graduate Zhenyu won the Rising Star Award of ACM SIGBED China. Dr. Zhenyu Yan won the Rising Star Award of ACM SIGBED China, 2021. (Click for details)

item.title: CUHK and ZJU Faculty
item.description: Dr. Zhenyu Yan and Dr. Chaojie joined the faculty of CUHK and ZJU. Dr. Zhenyu Yan and Dr. Chaojie joined the faculty of CUHK and ZJU.

item.title: Qun PhD defense 2022
item.description: Linshan completed his PhD defense. Qun completed her PhD defense, Aug 12th, 2022.

item.title: e-Energy 2021 - SECON 2021
item.description: Qun, Siyuan, and Joy presented their papers at e-Energy'21 and SECON'21

item.title: IPSN 2021
item.description: Wenjie presented PhyAug at IPSN'21 and won Best Artifact Award Runner-Up Wenjie has presented our paper “PhyAug: Physics-Directed Data Augmentation for Deep Sensing Model Transfer in Cyber-Physical Systems” on the ACM/IEEE IPSN 2021, part of CPS Week 2021. The paper has also be selected as the Best Artifact Award Runner-up. Congratulations!

item.title: IEEE PES Day 2021
item.description: IEEE PES Day 2021 Talk Rui gave a talk titled “Experiences and Learned Lessons from an Air Free-Cooled Tropical Data Center Testbed (Dec 2017 – Dec 2019)” on IEEE PES Day 2021.

item.title: Zhenyu Convocation 2020
item.description: Zhenyu completed his PhD defense. Zhenyu attended the NTU Convocation for the Class of 2020 and had his Ph.D. degree officially conferred. Rui also witnessed the ceremony.

item.title: IPSN TPC 2020
item.description: IPSN TPC meeting 2020 IPSN TPC meeting , Washington University in St. Louis, Jan 2020.

item.title: Chaojie PhD defense 2020
item.description: Zhenyu completed his PhD defense. Chaojie completed his PhD defense, Sep 22nd 2020.

item.title: Zhenyu PhD defense 2020
item.description: Zhenyu completed his PhD defense. Zhenyu completed his PhD defense, Feb 20th 2020.
